pullrequest.title: Added GUI configuration via INI file

content.raw: I'm not opposed to a minimum width, as long as it's sufficiently small, say 1000 pixels. I'm not worried about the `JointControl` tab; I think this can be resolved by adjusting the TimePanel. A scroll bar would be good short-term fix, and we could check with @spaepcke to see if it's good enough to be the long-term fix as well.
